DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study ass whether low caloric , low energy density , konjac food product effective appetite regulation administer caloric replacement . It hypothesize replacement typical , balance , vegetarian meal konjac food product comparable satiety score , decrease postprandial glucose response , significantly affect subsequent food intake .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Viscous Fibre Containing Foods Satiety ( Gel Form )
DOC.criteria: Healthy , nonsmoking male female Aged 1870 year BMI 18 29.9 kg/mÂ² Nondieters ( 110 score Stunkard Eating Inventory ) Known report history liver kidney disease , diabetes , hypertension , stroke myocardial infarction , thyroid disease , Celiac disease/gastrointestinal disease , AIDS Weight change +/ 3kg last 2 month Alcohol intake > 2 drinks/day Inability consume KJMG meals Any condition might jeopardize health safety subject study personnel , adversely affect study result Noncompliance experimental procedure safety guideline
